That makes no sense – American autoworkers are the best in the world, and we should fight to keep those jobs here.

It doesn’t have to be this way. The American Cars, American Jobs Act would get rid of tax cuts for moving jobs overseas and increase demand for American-made cars.  https://www.brown.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/brown-announces-legislation-to-support-ohio-auto-industry-american-jobs …
